channel.title: python3 on owen's blog
channel.description: Recent content in python3 on owen's blog

item.title: Linux 升级 python3
item.description: 本文的系统版本 centos7 x64，默认的 python 版本为 2.7，升级之后的版本为 3.8.1 安装依赖包 1 2 yum install zlib-devel bzip2-devel openssl-devel ncurses-devel sqlite-devel readline-devel tk-devel gcc make yum install libffi-devel # 缺少这个 make 时会报 ModuleNo
